alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Lyon; Pipestone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 4:19PM CST until January 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lingering light to moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Minnesota and central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could further reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
